text: The Oakland Raiders season was the team's 32nd season in the National Football League (NFL). == Offseason == === NFL Draft === 2001 Oakland Raiders Draft Round Selection Player Position College 1 28 Derrick Gibson SS Florida State 2 59 Marques Tuiasosopo QB Washington 3 89 DeLawrence Grant LB Oregon State 5 158 Ray Perryman SS Northern Arizona 5 168 Chris Cooper DT Nebraska–Omaha 7 228 Derek Combs CB Ohio State 7 229 Ken-Yon Rambo WR Ohio State == Final roster == 2001 Oakland Raiders final roster Quarterbacks * Rich Gannon * Rodney Peete * Marques Tuiasosopo Running Backs * Zack Crockett FB * Charlie Garner * Randy Jordan * Terry Kirby KR * Jon Ritchie FB * Tyrone Wheatley * Jermaine Williams Wide Receivers * Tim Brown PR * James Jett * Marcus Knight * Jerry Porter * Jerry Rice Tight Ends * Jeremy Brigham * Mondriel Fulcher * Roland Williams Offensive Linemen * Darryl Ashmore G/T * Mo Collins G * Aaron Graham C/LS * Lincoln Kennedy T * Frank Middleton G * Toby Myles T * Barry Sims T * Matt Stinchcomb T * Adam Treu C * Steve Wisniewski G Defensive Linemen * Tony Bryant DE * Roderick Coleman DT * Chris Cooper DE * DeLawrence Grant DE * Junior Ioane DT * Grady Jackson DT * Josh Taves DT * Regan Upshaw DE Linebackers * Elijah Alexander OLB * Eric Barton OLB * Greg Biekert MLB * Bobby Brooks MLB * Travian Smith OLB * William Thomas OLB Defensive Backs * Eric Allen CB * Anthony Dorsett FS * Derrick Gibson FS * Johnnie Harris SS * Tory James CB * Brandon Jennings CB * Marquez Pope SS * Charles Woodson CB/PR Special Teams * Brad Daluiso K * Sebastian Janikowski K * Shane Lechler P Reserve Lists * Trace Armstrong DE (IR) * Reggie Barlow WR (IR) * Bobby Hoying QB (IR) * Eric Johnson S (IR) * Barret Robbins C (IR) * Darrell Russell DT (Susp.)
